summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 between a law firm and the FBI regarding an FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses arrangements for a confidential client to attend a meeting, includes security protocols, and references coordination with another law firm handling Epstein claims.

persons.name: Craig Goldenfarb
persons.context: Principal of the law firm Craig Goldenfarb, P.A., which is representing a confidential client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein and coordinating with the FBI for a victim briefing.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miramar
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the Miami Field Office in Miramar, FL.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019 in Miramar, FL and New York, NY.
A law firm representing a confidential victim client coordinated with the FBI, emphasizing the need to protect the client's identity as it had never been publicly released.
The email chain references the 'Boise Schiller firm' as handling Epstein claims, indicating another legal entity involved in victim representation.
Attendance at the FBI briefings required detailed personal information for security clearance due to the federal building location.
